A: At Sterling Community Health Clinic, we offer a wide range of healthcare services to cater to your medical needs. Check-ups: Regular check-ups are essential for maintaining good health. Physical Exams: We offer comprehensive physical examinations, including routine health assessments, screenings, and preventive measures. These exams are vital for early detection and prevention of various medical conditions. Laboratory Services: Our clinic is equipped with a modern laboratory facility that enables us to perform a wide range of diagnostic tests. Vaccinations and Immunizations: Vaccines play a crucial role in safeguarding your health and preventing infectious diseases. At Sterling Community Health, we take pride in offering a diverse range of laboratory services to aid in accurate diagnoses and personalized medical care. Some of the laboratory services we provide include (but are not limited to): Blood Tests: Our clinic offers various blood tests to assess general health, check for specific medical conditions, monitor organ function, and evaluate overall wellness. Urinalysis: Urinalysis helps in detecting a wide range of conditions, such as kidney diseases, urinary tract infections, and certain metabolic disorders. Cholesterol and Lipid Panel: Monitoring cholesterol levels is essential in assessing cardiovascular health and the risk of heart disease. Blood Glucose Testing: This test measures blood sugar levels, crucial for managing diabetes and understanding glucose metabolism. Hormone Level Testing: We conduct tests to assess hormone levels and assist in diagnosing hormonal imbalances. Pregnancy Testing Strep A, Influenza, RSV, and COVID-19 testing. Call our clinic now to schedule an appointment. Our expert staff will provide specific instructions tailored to the test you'll be undergoing. At Sterling Community Health, we are dedicated to promoting holistic well-being and providing comprehensive healthcare services. We offer a range of health programs designed to address various health needs and empower individuals to lead healthier lives. Some of the health programs available include: Vaccines For Children: Our clinic provides a comprehensive vaccination program for children, ensuring they receive the necessary immunizations to protect them from preventable diseases. Vaccinations play a crucial role in safeguarding children's health and promoting a healthy future. DSME (Diabetes Self-Management Education): For individuals living with diabetes, our DSME program offers valuable education and support. Through this program, participants learn essential self-management skills to better control their condition, prevent complications, and improve their quality of life. Healthy Living Detox: Our healthy living detox program aims to support individuals in adopting healthier lifestyles and making positive changes in their daily habits. This program may include guidance on nutrition, physical activity, stress management, and overall wellness. Smoking Cessation: Quitting smoking is one of the most significant steps toward improving health. Our smoking cessation program provides tools, resources, and support to help individuals quit smoking and reduce the associated health risks. Don't hesitate to call us and take the first step towards a healthier future! While walk-ins are welcome, we highly recommend scheduling an appointment whenever possible. Scheduling an appointment allows us to better manage patient flow, minimize waiting times, and ensure that you receive prompt and focused attention from our healthcare professionals. By scheduling ahead of time, we can also prepare for your visit and streamline the process to meet your specific needs. You can call us directly at 513-954-0112 to book your appointment with our friendly staff. Alternatively, you can send us a message using our " [Contact Us](/contact)" form.
